item.title: Trump says he is working to get Afghan air base from Taliban
item.description: Such an outcome would signify a remarkable rapprochement after the U.S. fought a 20-year war against the militant group.

item.title: DEA faced pushback at White House, Pentagon after urging Mexico strikes
item.description: The suggestion, though not acted upon, was met with alarm from officials who warned that Congress has not authorized such action.

item.title: Why Charlie Kirk’s funeral is a seminal moment in the modern conservative movement
item.description: Kirk’s killing has galvanized and united the conservative movement in a singular way.
